name: The Isle of Hamsters
description:
Beware, you may not want to touch this game if you have arachnophobia. Isle of Hamsters is a survival strategy tower defense set in pitch black darkness, where the only way to make torches and turrets is by sacrificing hamsters which you find and lead around to machines that convert them into valuable resources. Your enemies are also spiders, that's why there was the warning above.

This game was developed by:

Jasun Burdick - Music

Matthew Tabet - Game design and story(there was one originally, but due to time crunch it got mostly scrapped)

Corbin Robers - Art

Jordan Baumann - Code and some art.
